title: Arcane Mark
description: Inscribes a permanent personal rune (visible or invisible).

title: Detect Magic
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft. for up to PER_LEVEL min. or until Concentration ends.

title: Ghost Sound
description: Figment sounds for PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Light
description: Object shines like a torch for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Mage Hand
description: 5-pound telekinesis. Lasts until Concentration ends.

title: Prestidigitation
description: Performs minor tricks for 1 hrs.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Feather Fall
description: Objects or creatures fall slowly for PER_LEVEL rds. or until landing.

title: Floating Disk
description: Creates 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds PER_LEVEL lb. Lasts for PER_LEVEL_SECOND hrs.

title: Mage Armor
description: Gives subject +4 Armor Bonus for PER_LEVEL hrs.

title: Magic Missile
description: PER_LEVELd4+PER_LEVEL dmg. Unerring. UNERRING.

title: Sleep
description: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Shocking Grasp
description: Touch delivers PER_LEVELd6 Electricity dmg.

title: Acid Arrow
description: Ranged Attack; 2d4 dmg. for 1 rds. + PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Flaming Sphere
description: Creates rolling ball of Fire for 2d6 dmg, lasts PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Invisibility
description: Subject is invisible for PER_LEVEL min. or until it attacks.

title: Knock
description: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

title: Levitate
description: Subject moves up and down at your direction for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Spider Climb
description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Clairaudience / Clairvoyance
description: Hear or see at a distance for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Dispel Magic
description: Cancels magical spells and effects.

title: Fireball
description: PER_LEVELd6 Fire dmg, 20-ft. radius.

title: Fly
description: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft. for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Lightning Bolt
description: Electricity deals PER_LEVELd6 dmg.

title: Vampiric Touch
description: Touch deals PER_LEVELd6 dmg; Spellcaster gains damage as Temporary HP which lasts for 1 hrs.

title: Animate Dead
description: Creates PER_LEVEL undead skeletons or zombies.

title: Arcane Eye
description: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Black Tentacles
description: Tentacles grapple all within 20 ft. spread for PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Dimension Door
description: Teleports you short distance.

title: Polymorph
description: Gives one willing subject a new form for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Stoneskin
description: Ignore 10 points of dmg. per attack. Lasts for PER_LEVELmin. or until discharged.

title: Cloudkill
description: Kills 3 HD or less; 4-6 HD save or die, 6+HD take STR dmg. Lasts for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Contact Other Plane
description: Lets you ask one question of extraplanar entity. Lasts until concentration ends.

title: Feeblemind
description: Subject’s MIND score drops to 1.

title: Passwall
description: Creates passage through wood or stone wall for PER_LEVEL hrs.

title: Permanency
description: Makes certain spells permanent.

title: Teleport
description: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles.

title: Antimagic Field
description: Negates magic within 10 ft. for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Chain Lightning
description: PER_LEVELd6 dmg; PER_LEVEL secondary bolt(s) each deals ½ dmg.

title: Contingency
description: Sets trigger condition for another spell. Lasts for PER_LEVEL day(s) or until discharged.

title: Disintegrate
description: Destroys one creature or object.

title: Geas
description: Commands any creature, binding it to a specific task. Lasts for PER_LEVEL day(s) or until discharged.

title: True Seeing
description: Lets you see all things as they really are for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Delayed Blast Fireball
description: PER_LEVELd6 fire dmg; you can postpone blast for 5 rds.

title: Ethereal Jaunt
description: You become ethereal for PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Finger of Death
description: Kills one subject.

title: Plane Shift
description: As many as eight subjects travel to another plane.

title: Power Word Blind
description: Blinds creature with 200 HP or less for 1d4+1 min. (permanent if creature has less than 50 HP).

title: Spell Turning
description: Reflect 1d4+6 Spell Levels back at Spellcaster for PER_LEVEL min. or until expended.

title: Clone
description: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

title: Horrid Wilting
description: Deals PER_LEVELd6 dmg. within 30 ft.

title: Incendiary Cloud
description: Cloud deals 4d6 fire dmg./round for PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Irresistible Dance
description: Forces subject to dance for 1d4+1 rds.

title: Power Word Stun
description: Stuns creature with 150 HP or less for 2d4 rds.

title: Trap the Soul
description: Imprisons subject within gem.

title: Astral Projection
description: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

title: Etherealness
description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions for PER_LEVEL min.

title: Gate
description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning. Open for PER_LEVEL rds.

title: Meteor Swarm
description: 4 × exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire dmg.

title: Power Word Kill
description: Kills one creature with 100 HP or less.

title: Soul Bind
description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.
